name: Gonger
description:
Great karma will come to those who find the balance of yin and yang. Delving too deep into one direction allows for great power but brings with it even greater punishments.

Made for the United Game Jam 2020

The theme was "two", and we interpreted this as the duality of yin and yang and the relationship between good and evil. 

We used the external assets: "PoiyomiShaders" and "Starfield Skybox".
